DOC.brief_summary: Patients with peritoneal dialysis will be administered an IV glucose-injection to evaluate the haemodynamic impact of this injection. The patients will be matched with healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Acute Haemodynamic Impact of an IV Glucose-Injection
DOC.criteria: > 18 years old Stable clinical condition Either peritoneal dialysis (at least one month) either matched healthy subject Heart Failure Diabetes requiring insulin treatment
